replies.body:
Have you heard about this yet? New for OCE
#https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LxQ0fYuKtfs&feature=youtu.be

The Colossus Bundle banner shows Gatekeeper Galio as being part of the bundle, but both the in-store list and the list here don't include it. What's up with that? If this was unintended and Gatekeeper Galio is supposed to be part of the bundle, then I haven't unlocked it.

Hey Staruniva, sorry for the delay here - I was chasing this one up for you :) Turns out the initial banner posted on this page was incorrect (as it showed Gatekeeper Galio) but the bundle doesn't actually include that skin. If you bought it thinking it did, we're happy to return your RP for you. Sorry for the confusion here.

I would be lying if I said I wasn't disappointed that the bundle didn't come with Gatekeeper Galio. However, I would have purchased the bundle regardless whether it came with Gatekeeper Galio or not. The other skins look just as great as the Legendary Skin, and that's saying something. Especially Enchanted Galio! (such a massive difference!) A big thanks to the art team for making Galio's lesser skins look just as great as his Legendary Skin!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yeah, that Enchanted Galio is pretty ace. I can get on board with running around the Rift as a faux Blue Buff. What do you think of his rework so far?

I haven't had a chance to play test him yet, but from I've seen, he looks and feels better. Flash-ulting and ridiculous healing were the only things the old Galio could really use to be noticed in team fights, and when you're without your ult you feel pretty useless. Losing the ridiculous healing is saddening, but I can still do flash ult plays (now flash-W or W-flash) AND offer more ways to contribute to team fights than just that. I can't wait to get onto the rift and make sick plays while saving teammates along the way!
Ah, so the banner itself was incorrect. Thank you for resolving that confusion. ^-^
The abilities tab when viewing him {{champion:3}}  in the collection doesn't appear complete. It explains the new abilities but the old ability videos are still there?
good to see you didn't listen to any of the negative feedback by a large number of people, and just put the rework through anyway.
